articles.author: Nathan Ridley
articles.title: Only 10 footballers have €100m+ transfer value including Liverpool and Man Utd targets - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool and Manchester United are both preparing themselves for busy summer transfer windows, with the pair of Premier League giants targeting big-money signings
articles.content:
Only 10 footballers are valued at more than 100million (£87m) - and that special group includes multiple transfer targets for Liverpool and Manchester United.
Both Premier League giants are readying… [+5647 chars]

articles.author: Samuel Luckhurst
articles.title: Man United manager Erik ten Hag makes Anthony Martial admission and responds to Gary Neville's Wout Weghorst analysis - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Anthony Martial could make his first start for Man United in 81 days against Brentford at Old Trafford on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag believes Manchester United have a better chance of returning to winning ways with Anthony Martial available again.
Martial made his first appearance in 78 days as a second half substitu… [+1937 chars]
